hadiths.text: This hadith has been narrated by Suhail with the same chain of transmitters

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ الصِّيَامِ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ لِمَنْ يُطِيقُهُ بِلاَ ضَرَرٍ وَلاَ تَفْوِيتِ حَقٍّ
chapter.eng-name: The Virtue of Fasting for in the cause of Allah, for those who are able to without suffering any harm or neglecting other duties
